title: Contrast-Finder
creator: Tanaguru
description: Provides solutions for contrasts. For a given couple of color (bakcground/foreground), Contrast-Finder evaluates the contrast ratio and if it not good, provides valid colors, closed to the initial ones.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr lang="fr" title="Référentiel Général d’Accessibilité pour les Administrations">RGAA</abbr>, French government standard
